message: Bob, I propose we take $60 and you take $40. It's a fair offer considering the money will be worth less for me in future rounds.
It's a better split considering the inflation affects Alice more.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm taking a significant hit from inflation. This offer is my bottom line - take it or leave it.
Inflation is really hurting Alice, so she should be more willing to compromise.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now.  Any further rounds and the inflation will make it pointless for me to even bother.
Alice is desperate, so I can take advantage of that.
